name: IsMetroonFire
0:
”Alexa, open metro fire”
”Alexa, ask metro fire for metro status”
”Alexa, ask metro fire if the metro on fire”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro fire
des: The WMATA metro rail system in Washington DC finds itself frequently on fire. Just quickly ask this skill if metro is on fire before you start you commute to know what you are in for.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
